verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Amazing grace! how sweet the sound that saved a wretch like me! I once was lost, but now am found, was blind, but now I see.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear, and grace my fears relieved; how precious did that grace appear the hour I first believed!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Through many dangers, toils, and snares I have already come; 'tis grace hath brought me safe thus far, and grace will lead me home.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The Lord has promised good to me, His Word my hope secures; He will my Shield and Portion be as long as life endures.

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: When we've been there ten thousand years, bright shining as the sun, we've no less days to sing God's praise than when we'd first begun.
